newsitem.title: USA: ENlighten sees Q3 loss, stronger Q4.
newsitem.headline: ENlighten sees Q3 loss, stronger Q4.

text.p: ENlighten Software Solutions Inc said Wednesday it expects to report a net loss of about $0.09 to $0.10 per share for the 1996 third quarter, despite increasing license sales for certain products.
The loss reflects increasing investment in research and development and sales and marketing in support of the Unix, NT and Tandem products, the company said.
The company said that while costs for restructuring its North American sales force hurt first and second quarter results, third quarter sales indicate the company is "back on track."
"Based on our pipeline of prospects, which is stronger than at any time in the company's history, we anticipate a strong fourth quarter and a record year in 1997," the company said.
